data.text: @SlayingThanos @capsfan117 @thehill So are you elderly , obese or a child

@Dirtyhorizon2 @capsfan117 @thehill I don't believe in dogma, especially with medical decisions. I believe the elderly and highly obese should get the shot since they're highly vulnerable to severe COVID illness. Everyone else like children probably shouldn't but that's a personal decision
@thehill America needs price controls to keep Big Oil from price gouging the American People ! https://t.co/AyepvOFRVn

@SlayingThanos @Dirtyhorizon2 @thehill Didn’t know those medical procedure detect problems with your genome?  Think about all you blood vessels floating around with that spike protein for the rest of your life, gives me the chills!!!
@SlayingThanos @capsfan117 @thehill Then why won’t you get the booster lol

@capsfan117 @Dirtyhorizon2 @thehill Well it's been 10 months now since my last shot and I'm still here. No myocarditis (already got that checked at the hospital with x-rays), no blood clots, nothing major at all. And I haven't even gotten COVID (or the flu for that matter) since then to my knowledge
@SlayingThanos @Dirtyhorizon2 @thehill The first jab was the one that started to modify your dna, doesn’t matter have many boosters you got.  PRIME EXAMPLE #1 on how YOU do as your TV TELLS YOU!!!
@SlayingThanos @capsfan117 @thehill Ah just stupid enough to get the first two jabs. Lol
@capsfan117 @Dirtyhorizon2 @thehill Except I didn't get the booster lol again so ignorant
@capsfan117 @Dirtyhorizon2 @thehill Actually I didn't get the booster because I thought it was too risky for me. You're ignorant of who I am if you think I'm a "Corona Bro"
